summary: Completed comprehensive testing of bulk delete functionality, incentive management, and reach/drop time fields. Bulk delete and incentive management features are working perfectly with proper admin-only access controls. However, reach/drop time fields are missing from the frontend UI despite backend support.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

ui_bugs.issue: Reach Time and Drop Time fields are missing from Vehicle & Trip section for Company orders
ui_bugs.details: Backend supports reach_time and drop_time fields, but frontend UI does not display these fields for company orders

passed_tests: Bulk delete functionality with checkboxes present for each order
Select All functionality working correctly
Bulk delete button appears when orders are selected ('Delete X Selected')
Admin-only access for bulk delete operations confirmed
Incentive Amount field visible and functional for admin users
Incentive Reason field visible and functional for admin users
Admin - Incentive Management section properly displayed
Role-based access message for incentive fields shown
Incentive fields only visible to admin/super_admin users
Backend API supports all incentive CRUD operations
Backend API supports reach_time and drop_time fields for company orders
Backend API supports bulk delete operations
Form submission works with incentive fields
Incentive data storage and retrieval via API working
Role-based authentication working correctly
Admin login and dashboard access working
Order creation with incentive fields via API confirmed
Bulk selection UI elements functional
Form layout includes incentive management section for admin users
Cash orders correctly do NOT show reach/drop time fields (as expected)
All dropdown values (drivers, firms, companies) stored correctly
Care Off fields continue to work as expected
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Add Reach Time and Drop Time fields to the frontend UI for Company orders in the Vehicle & Trip section. Backend already supports these fields (reach_time, drop_time) but they are missing from the frontend form. These fields should only appear for Company orders, not Cash orders.
